summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 FORD F-150. WHILE DRIVING AT UNKNOWN SPEEDS, THE VEHICLE DOWNSHIFTED UNEXPECTEDLY. THE WRENCH WARNING ICON ILLUMINATED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO DAVE SYVERSON FORD LINCOLN (2310 E MAIN ST, ALBERT LEA, MN 560047) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE TRANSMISSION AND LEAF SPRING WIRES NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED DUE TO PARTS BEING ON BACKORDER. ADDITIONALLY, THE CONTACT CALLED A LOCAL DEALER (GOOKIN FORD, 510 FACTORY OUTLET DRIVE, STORY CITY,  IA 50248) AND WAS INFORMED THAT PARTS WERE ON BACKORDER. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 290,000.
